abstract: A denotational semantic definition of SMALLTALK-80 is given. Its most notable characteristic is a surprisingly simple treatment of inheritance. An executable version of the semantics, written in STANDARD ML, is also described.

authors.name: S. Kamin
authors.affiliation: Computer Science Dept., 1304 W. Springfield University of Illinois, Urbana, Illinois

title: Inheritance in smalltalk-80: a denotational definition
